DOC.brief_title: A Study Evaluate Sigma-1 Dopamine-2 Receptor Occupancy Pridopidine Human Brain Healthy Volunteers Patients With Huntington 's Disease
DOC.criteria: In general , good physical health determine medical history psychiatric history , suicidality assessment & physical examination Men potentially fertile ( surgically [ eg , vasectomy ] congenitally sterile Patients Huntington 's disease ( HD ) : diagnosis HD onset HD 18 year age Additional criterion apply , please contact investigator information The subject previously expose ionize radiation radioactive substance result clinical research medical treatment past 10 year . The subject counterindication MRI History alcohol , narcotic , substance dependence past 2 year Additional Exclusion criterion patient Huntington 's disease : The patient severe motor impairment might cause artifact . Patients known history Long QT Syndrome first degree relative condition . Treatment investigational product within 6 week screen patient plan participate another clinical study assess investigational product study . Additional criterion apply , please contact investigator information
